title: Client keeps crashing while in champ select, now I'm in an hour long wait....anyone else suffering?
body: Can this please be fixed. I'm so tired of the client crashes that have been happening lately......

replies.body:
You should be able to resolve this by working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as this is typically caused by specific network settings that often conflict with league, which results in a poor connection to the servers. 

Let me know if this helped.
